about_the_game:
MixoGames returns with the next inspiring installment of the Twistingo series with Twistingo: Bird Paradise!

After a devastating storm tears through the tropical Bird Paradise destroying the homes of the beautiful avian residents, the locals have come to you for help! You'll assist in rebuilding the homes of the birds that live in the lush island rainforest by searching the ruins and collecting resources to restore the island's former beauty. With lots of puzzle types including hidden-object, marble-matching, bingo, and more, this innovative new game brings it all together in an adventure through paradise like no other!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

  • Explore deeper into the wilderness with the bonus stage!
  • Test your skills with 21 additional puzzle levels!
  • Gather coins to unlock a variety of unique collectibles!
  • 3 mini-game modes to earn extra coins!
  • Extensive gallery of beautiful pictures from across the island, Music player and more!
detailed_description:
MixoGames returns with the next inspiring installment of the Twistingo series with Twistingo: Bird Paradise!

After a devastating storm tears through the tropical Bird Paradise destroying the homes of the beautiful avian residents, the locals have come to you for help! You'll assist in rebuilding the homes of the birds that live in the lush island rainforest by searching the ruins and collecting resources to restore the island's former beauty. With lots of puzzle types including hidden-object, marble-matching, bingo, and more, this innovative new game brings it all together in an adventure through paradise like no other!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

  • Explore deeper into the wilderness with the bonus stage!
  • Test your skills with 21 additional puzzle levels!
  • Gather coins to unlock a variety of unique collectibles!
  • 3 mini-game modes to earn extra coins!
  • Extensive gallery of beautiful pictures from across the island, Music player and more!

short_description: Play a variety of puzzles and games, including clever blends of hidden objects, bingo, and marble-popping. Are you up to the challenge?
supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support
